import React,{ useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' import {MDBTable,MDBTableHead,MDBTableBody,MDBRow,MDBCol,MDBContainer, MDBBtnGroup, MDBBtn} from 'mdb-react-ui-kit' const Read = () => { const [data,setdata] = useState([]); const [value,setValue] = useState() useEffect(()=>{ userData(); },[]) const userData = async()=>{ return await axios.get("http://localhost:4000/users") .then((res)=>setdata(res.data)) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } console.log("data", data) return ( <>
setValue(e.target.value)} /> Search Reset

Search,Filter sort ,pagination using json fakr api

Sr.No. Name Email Phone Address Status {data.length === 0 ? ( tr No Data Found ):( data.map((item,index)=>( {index+1} {item.name} {item.email} {item.mobile} {item.address} {item.status} )) )}
) } export default Read
